Package model.spec

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agreement
    Class to model an Agreement specification.
    Aliveness
    Class to model Aliveness Specification Aliveness(A, B)means that if B thinks he has successfully completed a run of the protocol with A, then A has previously been running the protocol.
    NonInjectiveAgreement
    Class to model a NonInjectiveAgreement NonInjectiveAgreement(A, B, [v1,...,vn])means that if B thinks he has successfully completed a run of the protocol with A, then A has previously been running the protocol,apparently with B, and both agents agreed as to which roles they took, and both agents agreed as to the values of the variables v1, .
    Secret
    Class to model a Secret Specification Secret(A, s, [B1,...,Bn])specifies that in any completed run, A can expect the value of the variables to be a secret; B1, .
    Specification
    Abstract base class to model a Specification
    StrongSecret
    Class to model a Strong Secret, similar to Secret but holds for partial protocol runs.
    TimedAgreement
    Class to model a TimedAgreement NOTE: Timed execution of protocols is not in the scope of this project.
    TimedAliveness
    Class to model a TimedAliveness NOTE: Timed execution of protocols is not in the scope of this project.
    TimedNonInjectiveAgreement
    Class to model a TimedNonInjectiveAgreement NOTE: Timed execution of protocols is not in the scope of this project.
    TimedWeakAgreement
    Class to model a TimedWeakAgreement NOTE: Timed execution of protocols is not in the scope of this project.
    WeakAgreement
    Class to model a WeakAgreement WeakAgreement(A, B)means that if B thinks he has successfully completed a run of the protocol with A, then A has previously been running the protocol, apparently with B.
